title: Torchlight II-GOG
description:
Torchlight 2  (c) Runic Games

Release Date : 05/2016
Protection : -
Discs : 1
Game Version : 1.25.9.5
Genre : Action, Adventure, RPG, Indie
Languages : EN/DE/PL/CN/JP/RU

The award-winning action RPG is  back,  bigger  and
better than ever! Torchlight II takes you back into
the  quirky,  fast-paced  world   of   bloodthirsty
monsters, bountiful treasures, and sinister secrets
and, once again, the fate of the world is  in  your
hands! Torchlight II captures all  the  flavor  and
excitement of the original game -  while  expanding
the world and adding the  features  players  wanted
most, including onlineand  LAN  co-op  multiplayer.
Torchlight II is fast, fun, and filled to the  brim
with action and loot. Adventure solo or online with
your friends!

1- Install the game
2- Play
